title: TH GRADE
text: Well, here we are, dude, the first day of fourth grade.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah. No more getting pushed around by fourth graders!

title: TH GRADE
text: Get out of my way, you little dorks!

title: TH GRADE
text: Hey! We're fourth-graders now, too!

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah, but now, we're fifth-graders, you stupid fourth-graders, so move it!

title: TH GRADE
text: Ungh, gay, dude.

title: TH GRADE
text: Dude, we gotta find some third-graders to beat up.  Hey, come here

title: TH GRADE
text: What?

title: TH GRADE
text: What grade are you going into?

title: TH GRADE
text: Thi-ird

title: TH GRADE
text: Stupid third grader!

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah,  get out of here!

title: TH GRADE
text: Uhuhuhow.

title: TH GRADE
text: There, that's better.

title: TH GRADE
text: You know, I heard our fourth-grade teacher is some new lady from Denver.

title: TH GRADE
text: Denver?

title: TH GRADE
text: U-hoh, dude, we could walk all over her.

title: TH GRADE
text: He's right. We have to take a hard stance right now and establish that we're the dominant ones in this relationship!

title: TH GRADE
text: Alright.  Hey, listen up everybody! We need to stand up to this new teacher and insert ourselves! Let's all do something radical!

title: TH GRADE
text: Like what?

title: TH GRADE
text: Like... ah, how about right at 8:35 we all jump up on our desks and pull down our pants and shout, "KISS MY ASS!!!" all together!

title: TH GRADE
text: YEAH!!!

title: TH GRADE
text: Why, that's PERfect!

title: TH GRADE
text: Well, buh wuh when we pull our pants down,  should we stand frontways or back? I mean, do we show 'er our... behinds, or-ar our w-wieners?

title: TH GRADE
text: ...I think showing her our asses should be quite sufficient, Butters.

title: TH GRADE
text: Uh-uh, maybe we could stand like this , with our wieners pokin' through the back of our legs, you know, and give 'er a nice fruit bowl.

title: TH GRADE
text: ...Yeah. Or we could just show our asses.

title: TH GRADE
text: Okay, so it's decided. When the clock hits 8:35 we all stand up on our desks, pull down our pants and yell, "KISS MY ASS!!!"

title: TH GRADE

title: TH GRADE
text: YEAH!!!

title: TH GRADE

title: TH GRADE

title: TH GRADE
text: The bell rings again, and the kids enter their new classroom a bit awed at the surroundings. Lab sinks and equipment line the walls. New, modern desks greet them. An aquarium and some modern art are also present.

title: TH GRADE
text: Whoa, dude, this is our new classroom?

title: TH GRADE
text: Huhuh, look at all this stuff.

title: TH GRADE
text: Hey, what the hell is with these little half-desks?

title: TH GRADE
text: Dude, look at the walls.  Everythng is written in some strange, foreign language.

title: TH GRADE
text: Alright, children, quiet down. Welcome to the fourth grade.

title: TH GRADE
text: Holy God, dude!

title: TH GRADE
text: (Those tittes are fuckin' huge!)

title: TH GRADE
text: My name is Ms. Choksondik.

title: TH GRADE
text: ...More like, Ms. Makesmesick.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah!

title: TH GRADE
text: Play time is over, children! Do you understand me?!  I don't know how your last teacher behaved, but this is the fourth grade!  And it is time to go to work!

title: TH GRADE
text: KISS MY ASS!!!  Oh, weak, you guys. Seriously weak.

title: TH GRADE
text: Well, young man, I hope you have a good explanation for this.

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh, I'm sure I do.

title: TH GRADE
text: This is the fourth grade! You need to grow up!

title: TH GRADE
text: I'm trying.

title: TH GRADE
text: Now, get back to your desk and write a thousand-word essay on why you feel you need to disrupt my class.

title: TH GRADE
text: Fantastic, then.

title: TH GRADE
text: Now, let us begin our first-day exam. SILENCE!

title: TH GRADE
text: South Park Elementary, outside. The bell rings, and the students head out onto the playground.

title: TH GRADE
text: What a bitch!

title: TH GRADE
text: And did you see her lazy eye? You can't even tell what she's looking at.

title: TH GRADE
text: You guys are all such pussies!

title: TH GRADE
text: I can't take it, man! Writing in cursive?? Fractions?? I can't do i-it!

title: TH GRADE
text: This is it. The end of innocence.  This is the loss of that playful youth all our parents told us about.

title: TH GRADE
text: I just didnt think it would come so soon.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah. Only now do we realize how much we all took the third grade for granted.

title: TH GRADE
text: Huh?

title: TH GRADE
text: Everything was great in third grade. And now that it's all over, we'er starting to see just how special it was.

title: TH GRADE
text: wistfully

title: TH GRADE

title: TH GRADE
text: Wow! I had already forgotten how great third grade was.

title: TH GRADE
text: Huh-it sure was.

title: TH GRADE
text: I wish I was sstill there.

title: TH GRADE
text: Hey, that's it! We gotta go back to third grade!

title: TH GRADE
text: We travel back in time.

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh yeah, time travel.

title: TH GRADE
text: Oowuh how are we gonna do that? Does it hurt?  I don't wanna do it if it hurts. Or if it... makes you get all sticky.

title: TH GRADE
text: It can't be that bad. People do it on TV all the time.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah, we just have to find somebody who knows how to do it.

title: TH GRADE
text: Well, what about those two college guys next door to me? They're always doing science experiments in their basement.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah, if there's a way to travel back in time, those two dorks will know how!

title: TH GRADE
text: The basement of the two college guys, after school. These are computer geeks, with at least three computers in there. The blond guy works on his nose as he talks.

title: TH GRADE
text: When it comes to time-traveling theory, there are basically two school of thought. The Spock Theory is that a sling shot around the sun could create a wormhole in which time could not escape. The Lieutenant Commander Data Theory, however, is that a nag vibration could create a rip in the time-space continuum-

title: TH GRADE
text: Look, whatever it takes, we just have to get back to third grade.

title: TH GRADE
text: Time-travel is no laughing matter. Four times the Enterprise went back in time, and four times they almost didn't make it back.

title: TH GRADE
text: We don't want to make it back, we want to stay there.

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh.

title: TH GRADE
text: So can you do it?

title: TH GRADE
text: It's all theoretical, but from a scientific standpoint, the creation of a rip in space-time is possible. We just need to find an inertia device.

title: TH GRADE
text: Heeeyyy.  This kid's electric wheelchair might be just what we need.

title: TH GRADE
text: Tuh-timmih?

title: TH GRADE

text: Uh, you see, Chef, Ms. Choksondik has very large, uh, honkers, and she doesn't seem to like wearing a bra.

text: What?!

title: TH GRADE
text: Dude, if you guys build another time machine, you can travel back in time and ask the creator of Star Trek how many episodes there were!

title: TH GRADE
text: Dude, Jesus, you're right.

title: TH GRADE
text: South Park, the "Matterhorn." Mr. Garrison takes Ms. Choksondik to a gnarled, giant willow tree on a mountainside forest

title: TH GRADE
text: This is it: The Tree of Insight. You must go in and face what lives inside.

title: TH GRADE
text: What lives inside?

title: TH GRADE
text: Hel if I know. I wouldn't go in there.

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh, alrighty.  What the? Why there's nothng in here but an exit to the other side!  There's nothing in here at all. ...Oh, and I actually thought my mental demons would be in here.  Wait a minute. Maybe there's not supposed to be anythng in here. Maybe I'm supposed to see that I alone do have the strength to reach the kids!  I think I get it now!

title: TH GRADE
text: Hey, hurry up in there!  Jesus.  You're taking too long in the damn Tree of Insight!  You in there?!  Hey, where the hell did she go?  What the?  Haaa! Who? Who are you?

title: TH GRADE
text: I am you.  I am your gay side.

title: TH GRADE
text: My gay side, uh- I DON'T HAVE A GAY SIDE!!!

title: TH GRADE
text: You must face me at last.

title: TH GRADE
text: South Park, the "Matterhorn," moments later...

title: TH GRADE
text: You aren't real! You can't be!

title: TH GRADE
text: It is me, your darkest fear. Your gay self, incarnate.

title: TH GRADE
text: What do you want?

title: TH GRADE
text: I want you to not fight me anymore. To accept me, once and for all.

title: TH GRADE
text: Why?

title: TH GRADE
text: Don't you see?  All these years, your pain, your confusion, it comes from one place. Your denial of who you are. Of who... we are.

title: TH GRADE
text: But I'm not gay! Everyone just thinks I am!

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh, stop it! What about the time you looked at Counselor Mackey's penis in the men's locker room?!

title: TH GRADE
text: I was just comparing size!

title: TH GRADE
text: For seven minutes?!

title: TH GRADE
text: Aaa!

title: TH GRADE
text: And what about the time you masturbated to the men's 100-meter swimming relay at the Olympics?!

title: TH GRADE
text: I was beating off to the chicks!

title: TH GRADE
text: THERE WERE NO CHICKS!

title: TH GRADE
text: OH, DAMN YOU SPIRIT! HAUNT ME NO LONGER!

title: TH GRADE
text: ADMIT IT!

title: TH GRADE
text: NO!!!

title: TH GRADE
text: YOU HAVE TO STOP LYING TO YOURSELF AND GET A G-

title: TH GRADE
text: ALRIGHT, ALRIGHT, I ADMIT IT! I'M GAY!!! I'm...gay. I'm gay!  I am gay! You hear that everyone?  I'm gay! I'm gay! I'm gay and it...  and it feels good.

title: TH GRADE
text: South Park Elementary, Ms. Choksondik's classroom, a few days later. Where the chalkboard used to be are just some boards hastily put up, along with a DO NOT CROSS line and three safety cones to guard this makeshift board.

title: TH GRADE
text: Alright, children, I hope you all did your-  Oowhat is going on now?!

title: TH GRADE
text: Haha, Teacher, we're traveling back in time to third grade!-God-damnit you guys, you seriously said this time you'd snap into it with me.

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh Good Gravy, not this again.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yes! We've had a new time maching built: this one out of a simple microwave oven and a duck  Au revoir, teacher! Perheps we shall see you in the past, hahaa. Gentlemen?

title: TH GRADE
text: Children, I will have order!!

title: TH GRADE
text: I can't wait for Gene Roddenberry to tell you how WRONG you are! Just like when you said there were no two-parters of Battlestar Galactica!

title: TH GRADE
text: There WEREN'T!

title: TH GRADE
text: The episode called "Gonzo on Ice Planet Zero" was a two-parter.

title: TH GRADE
text: No it WASN'T!

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh, son of a bitch!

title: TH GRADE
text: I'll kill you!

title: TH GRADE
text: There it is! Come on, everybody!

title: TH GRADE
text: Children, get back into your seats!

title: TH GRADE
text: No way, lady!

title: TH GRADE
text: Eric, I mean it!

title: TH GRADE
text: You can suck my balls!

title: TH GRADE
text: Present them.

title: TH GRADE
text: ...What?

title: TH GRADE
text: You said, "suck my balls." Well, go ahead. Whip 'em out, and I'll suck 'em.

title: TH GRADE
text: Thah... That's what Mr. Garrison would've said.

title: TH GRADE
text: Touché, teacher. Touché.

title: TH GRADE
text: Now, children, listen to me. Why do you want to go back in time? Life isn't about going back, it's about going forward. Yes, there are times in our life that we wish we could relive, but, if we already lived them perfectly, why live them again? The adventure of life is that there's always something new. New challenges, new experiences. A fun game is a game that gets harder as it goes. So it is with life. Do you understand?

title: TH GRADE
text: Dude. Sh-she's right.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah. And you know, now that I think about it, third grade wasn't all that great, either.

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah. Third grade sucked! Cartman, why the hell did you try to make us think third grad was so great?!

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah! You suck, Cartman!

title: TH GRADE
text: What??

title: TH GRADE
text: Alright, students, that will be quite enough! If you're ready, let's continue on... with the fourth grade.

title: TH GRADE
text: AAAAAAA!

title: TH GRADE
text: Hey, Timmy's back!

title: TH GRADE
text: Dude, it looks like he's been all over time! He must have such cool stuff to tell us.

title: TH GRADE
text: Eh, Timmih.

title: TH GRADE
text: South Park Elementary, Principal's office. Chef talks with Mr. Mackey and Principal Victoria

title: TH GRADE
text: You know I'm always here to help, Principal Victoria.

title: TH GRADE
text: Ey, guess what everybody?! I'M GAY!!!

title: TH GRADE
text: Mr. Garrison?

title: TH GRADE
text: What?

title: TH GRADE
text: I'm as gay as a gymnast on shore leave!

title: TH GRADE
text: You admit it? You admit it!

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh, that's great, Mr. Garrison. You've finally come to terms with yourself!

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah, it feels really good!

title: TH GRADE
text: Well, congratulations!

title: TH GRADE
text: Yeah, congratulations!

title: TH GRADE
text: You know, I, I feel like I can start anew. If it's alright with you, I'd like to go back to teaching the third grade!

title: TH GRADE
text: Oh. I'm sorry, we don't hire gay people.
